events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return it as it does not meet my expectations and I would like a refund for the purchase.
The customer's request involves returning a product and obtaining a refund; assigning to Refund cluster accordingly.
Assigning this refund request case to the Refund department for handling by an available agent.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the product?
The order number is 123456789, and I want to return it because the item was not as described and the size is wrong.
We can process a full refund upon receiving the returned item. Please use the prepaid return label we'll email you shortly.
Thank you for your quick assistance. I appreciate the prepaid return label and will send the item back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned item and the refund has been processed to your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The refund case has been formally closed based on confirmation of refund receipt and no further customer issues.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey link to provide feedback on your recent refund experience with us.
